Package com.gsm.dto

Class ProductVariantDto

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gsm.dto.ProductVariantDto
  • public class ProductVariantDto
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Transfer Object for a ProductVariant.

    Represents a specific variation of a product (e.g., by color and size). It is typically used as a nested object within a ProductDto.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      The unique identifier of the product variant.

    • Field Detail

      • productVariantId

        private java.lang.Long productVariantId
        The unique identifier of the product variant. Can be null for a new variant.

      • color

        @NotBlank(message="Color cannot be blank")
@Size(max=50)
private @NotBlank(message="Color cannot be blank") @Size(max=50) java.lang.String color
        The color of the variant.

      • size

        @NotBlank(message="Size cannot be blank")
@Size(max=20)
private @NotBlank(message="Size cannot be blank") @Size(max=20) java.lang.String size
        The size of the variant. Can contain multiple sizes separated by commas (e.g., "S, M, L").

      • sku

        @NotBlank(message="SKU cannot be blank")
@Size(max=100)
private @NotBlank(message="SKU cannot be blank") @Size(max=100) java.lang.String sku
        The Stock Keeping Unit. Should be unique for each variant.

      • price

        @NotNull(message="Price cannot be null")
@PositiveOrZero(message="Price must be zero or positive")
private @NotNull(message="Price cannot be null") @PositiveOrZero(message="Price must be zero or positive") java.lang.Double price
        The selling price of the variant. Must be a positive number or zero.

      • currency

        @Size(max=3,
      message="Currency code must be 3 characters")
private @Size(max=3,message="Currency code must be 3 characters") java.lang.String currency
        The currency code for the price, e.g., "VND".

      • deletable

        private boolean deletable
        A flag to indicate if the variant can be deleted. Default is true. It becomes false if the variant is used in any sale order.
